bibl.title: Dispatch from Robert Scott Newton to the Assistant Secretary of State
Despatches from United States consuls in St. Paul de Loanda, 1854-1893

revisionDesc.change: Creation of individual xml files, review, and addition encoding

div1.opener:
United States Consulate
at St Paul de Loanda
div1.p: To the Department of State Mr Robert Scott Newton

Subject
Acknowledging receipt of Consular Regulations, Flag, and Circulars.

opener.dateline:
United States Consulate
St Paul de Loanda
30th September 1881

div1.p:
Sir
I have the honor to acknowledge receipt of the Revised Consular Regulations of 1881 and one Consular Flag forwarded to me by B. F. Stevens of London. I have also duly received Circulars dated May 1st and June 20th and Circular dated July 25th with reference to the new Consular Regulations which has my attention.
I have the honor to be Sir Your most Obedient Servant Robt S Newton Vice Consul
To the Assistant Secretary of State Washington D.C.
